attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to see action taken over mps claiming money that they were not supposed to have. its not fair that these mps can do what they like If they werent honest in the first place then why are they still in office Why should they do what they like when others are suffering.They should have a taste of the criminal record the same as other people in the world and sacked for being dishonest other people are suffring while this mps are living a life of luxsury this goverment is quick at taking to court for earning an extra penny. LETS SEE ACTION ON THE MPS THAT WERE NOT HONEST it was the people of this countrys money they were abuseing not theirs no wonder this country is in a state putting back the 1,000 of pounds might help the poor people the goverment is still sqeezing dry to cover up the mess were in

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
